paramList.name: K
paramList.title: K
paramList.description: Path to the model's stiffness matrix (saved in the NASTRAN Output4 format)Define the analysis as a flutter analysis

paramList.name: D
paramList.title: D
paramList.description: Path to the model's damping matrix (saved in the NASTRAN Output4 format), optional (then the damping matrix is zero)

paramList.name: M
paramList.title: M
paramList.description: Path to the model's mass matrix (saved in the NASTRAN Output4 format).

paramList.name: GAF
paramList.title: GAF
paramList.description: Paths to the model's generalized aerodynamics matrices (complex, saved in the NASTRAN Output format).

paramList.name: GAF_method
paramList.description: Defines the way to use the generalized aerodynamics when imported with GAF. This has effects on the influence of the damping on the aerodynamics, but not on the flutter points

paramList.name: GAF_RAE
paramList.description: Paths to the model's generalized aerodynamics matrices (real, saved in the NASTRAN Output4 format) in the RAEformulation (aerodynamic damping [B] and stiffness [C] matrices). GAF_method does not apply for these aerodynamic matrices. A factor can be defined to use also this input for the BAE-formulation.

paramList.name: FCS
paramList.description: Flight-Control System (FCS) properties of the model, activates the analysis with FCS automatically

paramList.name: FCS_state_space_A
paramList.description: Path to the FCS state (or system) matrix A (real, saved in the NASTRAN Output4 format) in state-space modeling.

paramList.name: FCS_state_space_B
paramList.description: Path to the FCS state (or system) matrix B (real, saved in the NASTRAN Output4 format) in state-space modeling.

paramList.name: FCS_state_space_C
paramList.description: Path to the FCS state (or system) matrix C (real, saved in the NASTRAN Output4 format) in state-space modeling.

paramList.name: FCS_state_space_D
paramList.description: Path to the FCS feed through (or feed forward) matrix D (real, saved in the NASTRAN Output4 format) in state-space modelling, optional (then the D matrix is zero).

paramList.name: FCS_modal2sensors
paramList.description: Path to the matrix relating the modal amplitudes (input of the FCS) to the sensors' displacements (saved in the NASTRAN Output4 format).

paramList.name: FCS_actuators2modal
paramList.description: Path to the matrix relating the actuators' (or control surfaces') movement (output of the FCS) to the modal amplitudes (saved in the NASTRAN Output4 format).

paramList.name: L_ref
paramList.description: Reference length for the aerodynamics (e.g. reduced frequency: k=Ï‰*L_ref/V)

paramList.name: rm_dof
paramList.description: Remove some degrees of freedom of the input (modal) matrices by suppressing the rows and columns bound to them
columnNames: Degree of freedom to be removed
